meanings.sent1: The old car juddered as it struggled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake made the ground judder beneath our feet.
meanings.sent3: The washing machine juddered so much, it looked like it was dancing!
meanings.sent4: His voice juddered with fear as he spoke about the ghostly encounter.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm juddered through the night, keeping everyone awake.

meanings.sent1: The juddered glass of water spilled all over the table.
meanings.sent2: The juddered bridge creaked under the weight of the heavy truck.
meanings.sent3: The juddered phone on the table seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a juddered engine, racing with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The juddered ground felt like it might split open at any moment.
